Name: Zeus
Description:
Odin is a heavy Siege Strider. It has the power to destroy a whole city.

Can attack the ground and air.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Fires a pulse that deals 100 damage to all enemies in a frontal cone and reduces their movement speed by 50% for 4 seconds.
Root.Name: Thunder Pulse

Root.Tooltip: Zeus gains Tesla Warhead effect for 15 seconds, and its attack will apply a pulse to the target unit, dealing 50 damage each seconds to its nearby enemies for 5 seconds. If the target dies while having charge on it, the pulse remains in place.
Root.Name: Tesla Warhead

Root.Tooltip: Zeus fires 8 waves of barrage at an area over 5 seconds and each wave deals 50 damage. Deals 50% more damage to structures and heroic units.
Root.Name: Pulse Barrage

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 6 seconds to land, but they deal up to 600 damage in a large area. Units affected take 2 damage each 0.2 seconds for 15 seconds.
Root.Name: Nuclear Strike

Root.Tooltip: Zeus is a Detector unit. Zeus will repair itself when out of combat. When it is destroyed, it rejoins the battlefield after 120 seconds.
Root.Name: Persevere Protocol

Root.Tooltip: Zeus has a 15% chance to stun non-hero units for 0.5 seconds when attacking them.
Root.Name: Concussive Cannonry

Root.Tooltip:
Zeus fires a pulse that stuns nearby enemy units when below 50% health. At the same time, Zeus quickly repair itself, restoring 2% of maximum health per second for 60 seconds or until fully repaired.
This effect triggers every 180 seconds.
Root.Name: Dire Strait Program

Root.Tooltip: Zeus can send out Satellite Scan every 30 seconds. In addition, Zeus will provide the matrix ability as the Korhal satellite, but only with 30% effect. This effect cannot be stacked and the matrix ability of Korhal satellite will always be dominant.
Root.Name: Mobile Matrix

Root.Tooltip: This unit has been affected by Satellite Scan. Instantly reduces its cooldown by 5%. Zeus's next attack will exhaust Satellite Scan, dealing 200% additional weapon damage. In addition, increase Zeus's vision by 8 for 10 seconds.
Root.Name: Satellite Scan

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Behaviors.Name: Detector

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Behaviors.Name: Detector
